moves.name: Lick
moves.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Supersonic
moves.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body. It may confuse the target.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Wrap
moves.description: A long body or vines are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Stomp
moves.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Rollout
moves.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes stronger each time it hits.

moves.name: Chip Away
moves.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes continually. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

moves.name: Me First
moves.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

moves.name: Refresh
moves.description: The user rests to cure itself of a poisoning, burn, or paralysis.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Power Whip
moves.description: The user violently whirls its vines or tentacles to harshly lash the target.

moves.name: Wring Out
moves.description: The user powerfully wrings the target. The more HP the target has, the greater this attack's power.
